snippet: The House leadership made an embarrassing retreat from an austere transportation and housing bill after realizing they couldn’t get enough votes to pass it.
abstract: Editorial welcomes embarrassment suffered by House Republican leadership when a bill backed by Rep Paul Ryan had to be pulled from the floor because not enough Republicans showed up to vote yes on his large budget cut proposals; contends failure to pass the bill reveals the Republicans' hypocrisy and weakness.
lead_paragraph: The House leadership made an embarrassing retreat from an austere transportation and housing bill after realizing they couldn’t get enough votes to pass it.

headline.main: Republican No-Shows in the Budget Wars
headline.print_headline: Republican No-Shows in the Budget Wars
